name: Motorway Madness
overview: Motorway Madness is THE game to play at parties. This game is a four player racing/shoot-em-up with a decidedly viscous streak. The objective is simple: eliminate all the opposition. The methods vary: dual forward firing machine guns, long range missiles or a large brutal ram strapped to the front of your car. However, remember that every car you eliminate this round will be out to get you in the next!
